channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Power 9 Systems
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Power 9 Systems

item.title: CVE-2021-20487|2024-08-03T17:45:44.333Z -- ibm -- power%209%20systems
item.description: IBM Power9 Self Boot Engine(SBE) could allow a privileged user to inject malicious code and compromise the integrity of the host firmware bypassing the host firmware signature verification process.
